bio.intro: I'm a full stack developer based in Germany with a background in design, content systems, and digital production.
bio.career1: I build user-focused frontends and practical backend services using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and FastAPI ‚Äî and I'm currently deepening my infrastructure and automation skills to support cleaner, more scalable systems.
bio.career2: My technical journey started at 13, learning MS-DOS from a stack of books my father gave me. I never studied computer science or attended a bootcamp ‚Äî I learned by building: first websites, then automation tools, and eventually full stack apps.
bio.career3: Before becoming a developer, I worked as an art director in digital agencies ‚Äî producing campaigns, managing delivery, and building websites for small businesses. That shaped how I approach engineering today: with precision, structure, and care for the end user.
bio.career4: At Santana Consulting, I support client platforms in the fitness industry ‚Äî building user flows, solving integration challenges, and managing content logic across tools and services.
bio.career5: My side projects include Moon Site, a full stack boilerplate using Next.js, FastAPI, and Markdown, and a Streamlit-based web scraper. I'm also exploring AI agent workflows, DevOps tools, and cloud deployment.
bio.summary: If you're looking for a developer who understands both frontend and backend systems ‚Äî and who brings curiosity, discipline, and real-world delivery ‚Äî I'd be glad to connect.
